title: The time to fight is now
description:
If you want to make a difference with your Black Friday deal shopping - if you want to join the fray and help us take back our country - become a Daily Wire member today. We need you with us in this fight.
For a limited time, we’re offering a whopping 50% off all new memberships when you use the code DW50 at checkout. This is the biggest sale of the year - you won’t get a better deal than this. So won’t you please join us now? This deal won’t last long, so act today. Click here to get started ==> https://bit.ly/3rdOjtG and don’t forget to use code DW50 to save. Thank you, and welcome to the fight.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
